code:
flowchart TD
    %% Applicant Eligibility Process
    A[Applicant Eligibility] --> B[Manufacturer/Producer]
    A --> C[Distributor/Trader]
    A --> D[Sub-contract Manufacturer]
    A --> E[Repacking]
    A --> F[Food Premise]
    A --> G[Abattoir/Slaughter House]

    %% Application Submission and Tracking
    H[Online Application Submission] --> I{Market Type?}
    I -->|National/International| J[Submit to JAKIM Halal Hub (Online)]
    I -->|Local Market| K[Submit to JAIN/MAIN (Direct)]
    J & K --> L[Application Tracking Dashboard]

    %% Application Review and Decision
    L -->|Pending| M[Under Review]
    M -->|Approved| N[Generate Halal QR Code]
    N --> O[QR Code for Product, Certificate, or Premise]
    M -->|Rejected| P[View Reasons & Resubmit]

    %% Reasons for Unsuccessful Applications
    Q[Reasons for Unsuccessful Applications] --> R[Company produces both Halal and Non-Halal products]
    Q --> S[Product is not Halal]
    Q --> T[Natural substances without processing]
    Q --> U[Drugs or pharmaceutical products]
    Q --> V[Hair color / hair dye]
    Q --> W[Processed products manufactured overseas]
    Q --> X[Products with confusing terminologies]
    Q --> Y[Fertilizers and animal feed]

    %% Required Forms and Documents
    Z[Required Forms] --> AA[Products / Consumer Goods]
    Z --> AB[Food Premise]
    Z --> AC[Slaughter House]
    AD[Required Documents] --> AE[Company Profile]
    AD --> AF[Company / Business Registration]
    AD --> AG[Name and Description of Product / Menu]
    AD --> AH[Ingredients Used]
    AD --> AI[Manufacturer / Ingredient Supplier Details]
    AD --> AJ[Halal Status for Ingredients or Product Specification]
    AD --> AK[Type of Packaging Material]
    AD --> AL[Manufacturing Process and Procedure]
    AD --> AM[Other Certificates (HACCP, ISO, GHP, GMP, TQM)]
    AD --> AN[Location Map of Premise / Factory]

    %% Applicant Actions
    AO[Applicant Action] --> AP[Create a Halal Confirmation Certificate File]
    AP --> AQ[Store all relevant documents for inspection]

    %% Enhancements
    O --> AR[Verify QR Code Online]
    AR -->|Valid| AS[Show Halal Certification Details]
    AR -->|Invalid| AT[Flag for Investigation]
    L -->|Automated Notifications| AU[Email/SMS Updates]
    AU --> AV[Applicant Notified at Each Stage]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
